title: Sinner Defeats Alcaraz to Win ATP Finals, Defends Title in Turin
snippets: Sinner wins Alcaraz battle to retain ATP Finals title Reuters
Jannik Sinner signs off his 2025 season in style by overcoming world number one Carlos Alcaraz in two tight sets to defend his ATP Finals crown in Turin.

Italian wins 7-6 (4), 7-5 in Turin final Sinner finishes year with six titles On his favourite surface and before a rowdy home crowd, Jannik Sinner closed out his immense season with a statement victory against his great rival Carlos Alcaraz, putting together a supreme performance to defeat the Span
Jannik Sinner retained the ATP Finals title in Turin as he beat Carlos Alcaraz in straight sets. The Alcaraz and Sinner rivalry is too hot for the rest of the field.
Jannik Sinner saw off close rival Carlos Alcaraz to clinch the ATP Finals title with a 7-6 (7-4) 7-5 victory after the Spaniard struggled with a hamstring injury.

The final installment of the “Sincaraz” rivalry for 2025 went to Jannik Sinner. The second-ranked Sinner beat the top-ranked Carlos Alcaraz 7-6 (4), 7-5 for the ATP Finals trophy on Sunday in the sixth meeting this year between the two players who are dominating men’s tennis.

Malgré un match accroché, le numéro un mondial n’a pas réussi, dimanche, à renverser son dauphin transalpin. Celui-ci s’est imposé 7-6, 7-5 et reste invaincu dans le « tournoi des maîtres » depuis la finale de l’édition 2023.
titles: Sinner wins Alcaraz battle to retain ATP Finals title - Reuters

Jannik Sinner sees off Carlos Alcaraz in straight sets to defend ATP Finals title
Sinner Wins ATP Finals As Alcaraz Runs Into Turin Wall Of Noise
Sinner clinches ATP Finals title as Alcaraz toils with hamstring injury

Jannik Sinner vient à bout de Carlos Alcaraz et conserve son titre au Masters ATP de tennis
summary: Jannik Sinner defeated world number one Carlos Alcaraz 7-6 (7-4), 7-5 to win the ATP Finals in Turin, defending his title in their sixth matchup of 2025. Alcaraz struggled with a hamstring injury during the match, marking a significant moment in the "Sincaraz" rivalry.
constructiveness_reason: This story provides basic awareness of the event but does not offer deep insights or actionable information. It does not report on solutions, improvements, or innovations, nor does it increase clarity around systems, causes, trends, or impacts.
